name: Follow-up Template
description: Professional follow-up email for initial contact
subject: Following up on our conversation - {contact.name}
body:
Hi {contact.name},

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on our recent conversation about {deal.title}.

I believe our solution could be a great fit for {contact.company}, and I'd love to discuss how we can help you achieve your goals.

Would you be available for a brief call this week to explore this further?

Best regards,
{user.name}

name: Proposal Template
description: Professional proposal email with deal details
subject: Proposal for {deal.title} - {contact.company}
body:
Dear {contact.name},

Thank you for your interest in our services. I'm pleased to provide you with a proposal for {deal.title}.

Based on our discussion, I understand that {contact.company} is looking for a solution that can help streamline your operations and drive growth.

Our proposed solution includes:
- Comprehensive analysis of your current processes
- Customized implementation plan
- Ongoing support and maintenance

The total investment for this project would be {deal.value}.

I'd be happy to schedule a meeting to discuss this proposal in detail and answer any questions you may have.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
{user.name}

name: Thank You Template
description: Thank you email after meeting or call
subject: Thank you for your time - {contact.name}
body:
Hi {contact.name},

Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today about {deal.title}. I really enjoyed our conversation and learning more about {contact.company}'s goals and challenges.

As discussed, I'll be sending over the additional information you requested by tomorrow. In the meantime, please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.

I look forward to continuing our conversation and exploring how we can work together.

Best regards,
{user.name}

name: Check-in Template
description: Regular check-in email for existing contacts
subject: Quick check-in - {contact.name}
body:
Hi {contact.name},

I hope you're doing well! I wanted to check in and see how things are going at {contact.company}.

It's been a while since we last spoke, and I'd love to hear about any new developments or challenges you might be facing.

If there's anything I can help you with or if you'd like to explore new opportunities for collaboration, please let me know.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
{user.name}

name: Meeting Request Template
subject: Meeting Request - {deal.title}
body:
Hi {contact.name},

I hope this email finds you well. I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss {deal.title} in more detail.

During our meeting, we can:
- Review your current requirements
- Discuss potential solutions
- Address any questions or concerns
- Outline next steps

I'm available for a meeting at your convenience. Please let me know what days and times work best for you, and I'll send over a calendar invitation.

Thank you for your time, and I look forward to our discussion.

Best regards,
{user.name}

name: Quote Request Template
description: Template for requesting quotes or pricing information
subject: Quote Request - {deal.title}
body:
Dear {contact.name},

Thank you for your interest in our services for {deal.title}. I'm excited about the opportunity to work with {contact.company}.

To provide you with an accurate quote, I'd like to gather some additional information about your specific requirements:

- Project timeline and key milestones
- Budget range and constraints
- Technical specifications or preferences
- Success criteria and expected outcomes

Would you be available for a brief call this week to discuss these details? This will help me prepare a comprehensive proposal that meets your needs.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,
{user.name}
